overview.en: A decentralized live streaming platform, Olive has equipped with Proof of Transaction(POT) to create a fair and globalized live streaming ecosystem. With this token-powered feature it boosts a profit sharing ratio up to a 90- percent level for channel hosts. Not only the channel hosts will be rewarded, but also every contributor within Olive ecosystem will be rewarded. For instance, there is at least 20% will reward to those audiences who voluntarily share their computational power.
overview.zh: Olive是全球第一个代币化泛娱乐生态，其价值循环包含娱乐、线上线下消费和数据资产交易三大板块，代币OLE基于以太坊ERC-20发行，在价值循环生态中具有诸多使用场景，为Olive带来了丰富的价值生态。在娱乐版块，OLE是串联在线直播平台方、主播、用户和广告主等参与方的重要纽带，通过优秀的激励机制达到参与方共赢，也是让Olive在线直播平台区别与目前传统的在线直播平台。
